definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
lapel/overlap of Chinese gown/fig. bosom (the seat of emotions)/to cherish (ambition, desires, honorable intentions etc) in one's bosom

sentences.english: Both male and female Dian people wore symmetrical pieces jackets without collar.
sentences.chinese: 滇池地区滇人男女均穿对襟无领外衣。

sentences.english: Lahu women in the West Touchan Tubu black turban, wearing a collarless shirt Duijin .
sentences.chinese: 拉祜西妇女头缠黑色土布头巾，身穿无领对襟短衫。

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
buttoned mandarin jacket of the Qing dynasty 清代[Qing1 dai4] (1644-1911)
everyday robe worn at home in ancient times/robe worn by priests, monks and scholars
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
